details.title: IELTS Writing Test Format
details.description: The writing examination consists of 2 tasks. You have to answer each task correctly to get your desired band score. Take a look at this video for the details of the structure.

details.title: Common errors in IELTS Writing
details.description: Writing without a proper structure, usage of colloquial/slangwords and giving memorised answers. These are some common errors found in the writing answers. This video will discuss how to avoid such errors while writing.

details.title: How to improve IELTS Writing
details.description: There are some good and effective ways by which you can improve your writing. Here are some tips and tricks that can be used to enhance your writing, take a look at this video.

details.title: What is the Essay Format
details.description: Knowing how to format your IELTS Writing Task 2 essay is a crucial skill that might be the difference between receiving the band score you deserve and not receiving it. Know how to properly structure your essay through this video.

details.title: Types Of Essay Questions
details.description: There are about 7 different types of question that a candidate might face on the test day. This video will give you a brief overview all of those types in detail.

details.title: Agree/Disagree Question Type
details.description: IELTS Writing Task 2 frequently includes essay questions that inquire whether you agree or disagree. This style of question requires you to express whether you agree or disagree with a specific statement and to explain why. Watch on to find out more about this sort.

details.title: To what extent do you agree?
details.description: This video will discuss a type of question that asks you how much you agree/disagree with the statement. IELTS Writing Task 2 frequently asks such questions. Your objective in such essays is to state if you: agree wholeheartedly with a given statement; Completely disagree with a particular assertion, or partially agree / disagree with it and explain why.

details.title: Discuss both sides and give your own opinion
details.description: This video will discuss how to talk about both sides of a notion and then to put forward your opinion on it.

details.title: What are the advantages and disadvantages?
details.description: In this video, an in depth explanation will be provided on the discussion the pros and cons of a notion.

details.title: Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
details.description: In this video, you will be taught how to weight the pros and cons of a notion.

details.title: Is this a positive or negative development
details.description: How does one express if a change is good or bad? That is the topic of discussion in this video.

details.title: Two-part questions- problem & Solution
details.description: This video will tell you about the discussion and presentation of a question that has two parts to it which will ask you to elaborate on a problem and its solution.

details.title: Two-part questions-Cause & Effect
details.description: This video will tell you about the discussion and presentation of a question that has two parts to it which will ask you a cause of a development and the changes it has brought about.

details.title: Two-part questions-2 independent questions
details.description: This video will tell you about the discussion and presentation of a question that has two independent parts to it.

details.title: Writing Task 2 Assessment Criteria
details.description: This video talks about how the marks are awarded in the essay of the IELTS Writing task 1.

details.title: Essay writing Solved with sample answer 1
details.description: This is the first of the two writing task 2 questions that will be solved with the explanation of the answer.

details.title: Essay writing Solved with sample answer 2
details.description: This is the second one of the two writing task 2 questions that will be solved with the explanation of the answer.
